constraints.name: max_element_in_range
constraints.description: 对于每个元素 A[i]，计算所有包含 A[i] 且 A[i] 是区间 [l, r] 内最大值的区间的和。
constraints.formal: f(i) = sum(A[l:r]) for all l, r such that l <= i <= r and A[i] >= A[j] for all j in [l, r]

constraints.name: sum_of_max_element_functions
constraints.description: 计算所有 f(i) 的和，其中 f(i) 表示 A[i] 作为区间 [l, r] 内最大值的所有区间的和。
constraints.formal: result = sum(f(i)) for all i in [0, n-1]
